title: Copernicus Hubs Essentials - The Coastal and the Arctic hubs
description: The Copernicus Marine Service is hosting a 2-part webinar series for beginners, designed to engage Earth Observation communities worldwide. This series is perfect for first-time users looking to explore, access, and use Coastal and Arctic Copernicus data with confidence. By the end, participants will have a clear understanding of all availableHubsresources and how to apply them to their work. This 2-part webinar series will follow this agenda: Session #1 - Copernicus Coastal Hub (12 Sept) Get introduced to the platform: data catalogue, Viewer and real-world applications showcasing the use of data in coastal regions. Session #2 - Copernicus Arctic Hub (19 Sept) Get introduced to the platform: data catalogue, Viewer and real-world applications showcasing the use of arctic data. Each session willÂ  featureguest speakersfrom the Earth Observation community, who will share their experiences and showcase practical applications of data available on the Copernicus Hubs.
organizer: Noveltis, Copernicus Marine Service, Mercator Ocean International
